hero.subtitle: Experience the power of targeted Digital advertising and engage your audience with our innovative solutions.

info1.title: No experience or big budget needed
info1.desc: New to online advertising? Learn how Daart Ads helps you reach your advertising goals without the high costs of traditional solutions.
info1.imageAlt: No experience or big budget needed

info2.title: Maximize Your Reach with Google Ads
info2.desc: Reach your audience at the exact moment they’re searching for your products or services. With Daart’s expert Google Ads management, your campaigns are optimized for the best ROI through strategic keyword targeting, smart bidding, and engaging ad creatives. Whether it’s Search, Display, or YouTube Ads — we ensure every click brings you closer to real results.

cardsSection.subtitle: Discover how Daart Ads leverages AI to supercharge your advertising campaigns with these powerful features:
cardsSection.title: What we do?

cards.title: Google Ads
cards.desc: Promote your business on Google Search and Display Network to reach users actively searching for your services.

cards.title: Banner Ads
cards.desc: Banner advertising is one of the most common forms of digital marketing, and Daart makes it more effective than ever.

cards.title: In-App Ads
cards.desc: Reach users directly inside their favorite apps with visually engaging and interactive ad content.

cards.title: Push Notification Ads
cards.desc: Deliver your message instantly with push notifications — a modern and effective way to engage your audience.

cards.title: Bing Ads
cards.desc: Expand your reach to Microsoft’s audience with targeted ads across Bing and partner sites.

cards.title: Social Media Ads
cards.desc: Engage your audience on platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn with tailored social media campaigns.

home.customersTitle: Some Customers Empowered by Daart Ads

faqs.question: What is online advertising?
faqs.answer: Online advertising refers to various types of advertising used through the internet to create brand awareness, generate interest, and sell products and services.

faqs.question: Why choose Daart Ads as your online advertising agency?
faqs.answer: Daart Ads shows your ads on internal and external platforms, targets your desired audience, provides reporting on digital advertising campaigns, and generates real traffic to your website.

faqs.question: How do I set up a campaign in Daart Ads online advertising platform?
faqs.answer: After completing registration on the Daart Ads website, you will enter the panel and select the desired campaign on the Create Campaign page. Your request is reviewed by experts who will contact you to launch the campaign.

faqs.question: What are the pricing strategies for online advertising?
faqs.answer: The online advertising price solutions are variable including : CPI (cost per install), CPC (cost per click), CPM (cost per thousand impressions), and CPL (cost per lead/sale).

items.name: Mohammad Mousavi
items.quote: Collaboration with Daart Digital Marketing Company has been full of new and pleasant experiences. The team actively participates in all campaigns, providing full support, follow-up, and interaction. They optimize campaigns and advertising by continuously analyzing data in the best possible way.

items.name: Mehrad Mahrooqi
items.quote: Daart Digital Marketing Agency has been with us for a long time and has always offered suitable solutions based on our needs. After interacting with their experts, their prominent role in improving our marketing metrics is clearly visible.

items.name: Alireza Houshmand
items.quote: Our collaboration with Hamrah Card and Daart Digital Advertising Agency has lasted three years. This continued cooperation is due to Daart's professional behavior and excellent support, making them one of the best digital marketing agencies.

items.name: Dana Enayati
items.quote: Our collaboration with Daart Internet Marketing Agency has lasted over four years. The Daart team works tirelessly to solve client problems and has a strong understanding of business needs and key performance indicators.

hero.title: Google
hero.subtitle: Maximize Your ROI with Strategic Google Advertising Solutions
hero.description: Drive qualified traffic, increase conversions, and grow your business with our expert Google Ads management services.

overview.title: What is
overview.description1: Google Ads is Google's online advertising platform that allows businesses to display ads on Google's search engine results pages and its advertising network. With over 3.5 billion searches per day, it's one of the most powerful tools for reaching potential customers.
overview.description2: Our team of certified experts will help you create, manage, and optimize Google Ads campaigns that deliver measurable results and maximize your return on investment.
